attributes.action: KEEP FREE TRADE BETWEEN THE EU AND UK. SAY NO TO NEW HMRC CUSTOM DECLARATIONS.
attributes.additional_details:
We call on you the British public to take action now to force UK Parliament to remove any possibility of a NO DEAL Brexit.

Sign the petition to declare your support to REFUSE any changes to our current customs agreement.

Say NO to No Deal and Yes to keeping free trade between the UK & EU.
attributes.background:
In the event of a NO DEAL Brexit we will be forced into generating custom declarations for any goods that we import or export to the EU. 

This will will have a devastating effect on businesses that have traded freely with EU companies and will increase the cost of importing & exporting to the UK

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

If you would like the UK Government or Parliament to avoid a no deal Brexit you could sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/227854

If you would like the UK to remain in the customs union with the EU after Brexit you could start a petition about that.
